Injector:



Injector sighed.  The female robots were always the dumbest it seemed.  "Hell 
Beast has more minions.  Many more.  He's overpowered Megatron a few times.  
They've had unsteady truces numerous times.  Now is just one of them.  Soon 
we'll probably end up hunting him down and hopefully I may get the pleasure 
of giving his head to Hell Beast on a pike."
